actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill relating to the relocation of certain Hopi and Navajo Indians pursuant to the act of December 22, 1974 (Public Law 93-531).

summary.text: Regulates the relocation of Hopi and Navajo individuals pursuant to Public Law 93-531. (An Act to provide for final settlement of the conflicting rights and interests of the Hopi and Navajo Tribes in certain lands.)

titles.title: A bill relating to the relocation of certain Hopi and Navajo Indians pursuant to the act of December 22, 1974 (Public Law 93-531).
